Summary: 7 dim red lights triangle shape very fast silent
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Bellevue
There were no other sightings in Bellevue on or around October 15th 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsI was laying with my buddy in the grass watching planes fly by at night, and they were very slow and noisy. Then we both noticed 7 dim red lights shaped like a > with 3 lights on each "wing" and one in the middle connecting them. it was out of sight within seconds and appeared much higher than the planes. the object flew unbelievably fast and made absolutely no noise. Me and my friend were satisfied with our sight and went home. the end!
